title: Is the minion pushing change live in 5.23?
body:
You guys said [here](http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-523-notes#patch-minion-pushing), that minion pushing would go live sometime during 5.23

Does anyone know if these changes are live yet?

replies.body:
Now, I'm pretty sure?

Sorry just read it properly, Possibly later, closer to the start of patch 5.24.
They were super vague about the most important change in the whole patch. Apparently we will be notified at some point, we don't know where, when or how. :(
Check [the news](http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) every now and then. Should be in there when it happens.
